authors.author: Fanny Jane Crosby Phoebe Palmer Knapp

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: This is my story, this is my song, newline Praising my Savior all the day long. newline This is my story, this is my song, newline Praising my Savior all the day long.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine! newline Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine! newline Heir of salvation, purchase of God, newline Born of His Spirit, washed in His blood!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Perfect submission, perfect delight! newline Visions of rapture now burst at my sight! newline Angels descending bring from above newline Echoes of mercy, whispers of love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Perfect submission, all is at rest. newline I in my Savior am happy and blest; newline Watching and waiting, looking above, newline Filled with His goodness, lost in His love.
